articles.description: Dennis Murphy, CEO of Indiana University Hospital, has accused a black woman whose video complaining of COVID treatment in his facility went viral, of being difficult. She died on Sunday.
articles.content:
A hospital CEO is under fire after accusing a black doctor of 'intiminating' nursing staff two weeks after she died from COVID-19.
Dr. Susan Moore, 52, died on Sunday due to complications from COVID… [+15798 chars]

articles.title: Christmas Eve death of OKC firefighter traced to call response; second fire department employee death reported Monday - Oklahoman.com
articles.description:
The Oklahoma City Fire Department announced Monday that Maj. Andy Davis, who died on Christmas Eve, caught the COVID-19 virus while responding to a call. 
 His death was followed by the death of a second fire department employee, Robert Saudia, a support serv…
